name: kids-book-website
description: A static website about donkeys for children - educational, engaging, and fun!

scripts.dev: npm run build && npx serve dist -p 8080
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:e2e: npm run dev & wait-on http://localhost:8080 && jest tests/e2e && kill %1
scripts.test:lighthouse: npm run dev & wait-on http://localhost:8080 && jest tests/e2e/lighthouse.test.js && kill %1
scripts.test:accessibility: npm run dev & wait-on http://localhost:8080 && jest tests/e2e/accessibility.test.js && kill %1

author: Kids Book Website Team
